rows.label: qst720601_msg0001
rows.name: Hey there, Montos.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0002
rows.name:
Adel-sama.
And it looks like you have your
traveling companions with you.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0003
rows.name:
So for all of you to come here...
I assume you're after
the Desert-Crossing Medicine?

rows.label: qst720601_msg0004
rows.name:
That's the idea. Look, we brought enough
Melanicarrots and Nest Extract
for all of us.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0005
rows.name: So well-prepared! I'm moved to tears.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0006
rows.name:
It's not just me. The people
of Aletta, the resistance soldiers...
everyone will be overjoyed, won't they?

rows.label: qst720601_msg0008
rows.name:
That His Highness Adel has finally
decided to shoulder the burden of Iira...

rows.label: qst720601_msg0009
rows.name: What? What are you talking about?

rows.label: qst720601_msg0010
rows.name:
To think the day is finally here when
Prince Adel will take the throne...
I've been waiting for this for so long.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0011
rows.name: What?! Adel, you were planning that?!

rows.label: qst720601_msg0012
rows.name: No, no, no! Of course not!

rows.label: qst720601_msg0013
rows.name:
Montos, how did you come
to that conclusion?!

rows.label: qst720601_msg0014
qst720601_msg0015
rows.name:
Everyone wishes they could be led
by someone with leadership skills,
like Prince Adel.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0016
rows.name:
It's true.
Even I'm envious of Adel's charisma.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0017
rows.name: What are you saying, Your Majesty?

rows.label: qst720601_msg0018
rows.name:
Even if Adel-sama is a man of great
virtue, I can never agree that my master
is in any way inferior.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0019
rows.name: Kagutsuchi agrees as well.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0020
rows.name:
No, look, whatever about my charisma,
I've never thought about
seizing the throne.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0021
rows.name:
I want to protect Iira.
That's why I'm going to the capital.
It's that simple.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0022
rows.name: Is that so... What a shame.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0023
rows.name:
Whether you mean it or not,
you probably shouldn't say
things like that.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0024
rows.name:
If the King's notoriously intolerant
younger brother were to hear about this,
things could get interesting.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0025
rows.name:
"Interesting"?
You say that like you're not involved.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0026
rows.name: Because it is someone else's problem.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0027
rows.name: However, your advice has been duly noted.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0028
rows.name:
As someone who dreams
of King Adel's reign, I'll be more
careful with my words.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0029
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]â€”Then I wish you'd stop
calling me 'Your Majesty,' too.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0030
rows.name:
So, Master Apothecary,
how long will it take to make
the Desert-Crossing Medicine?

rows.label: qst720601_msg0031
rows.name: Ah, yes! The purpose of your visit...

rows.label: qst720601_msg0032
rows.name:
Oh, if you have the ingredients,
it'll be quick. I'll go mix it up now.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0033
rows.name:
Here you go, sorry for the wait.
Desert-Crossing Medicine for five.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0034
rows.name: Thank you, Montos.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0035
rows.name:
With this, we can finally cross
Lett Bridge and head for the capital.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0036
rows.name: I'll pray for your safe journey.
